entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
